title: What Investors Need to Know about Single-Stock ETFs
description: Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster speaks with ETF industry pioneer Dave Nadig, financial futurist for VettaFi, about the year’s biggest ETF stories, including the launch of single-stock ETFs, and what lies ahead of the second half of 2022.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster speaks with ETF industry pioneer Dave Nadig, financial futurist for VettaFi, about the year’s biggest ETF stories, including the launch of single-stock ETFs, and what lies ahead of the second half of 2022.
